StoryText: Someone left a whole tray of brownies in the break room and I'm not sure if they're for everyone or not.
Question: What should I do?

OptionResult.Result: I was playing it safe and ate no brownies, but it turns out they WERE for everyone.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% made the brownies and left them there for everyone. By the time I found out, they were all gone. But I ate a healthy lunch instead of eating any brownies, so I guess that's good.

OptionResult.Result: I eat one brownie and it's delicious. I later find out they WERE for everyone.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% made the brownies for everyone and %Pron:1:1% is glad to hear that I thought the brownie was so delicious. Really put me in a good mood!

OptionResult.Result: I eat two brownies and it turns out they WERE for everyone. And they were delicious!
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: %FullName:NPC:1% made the brownies for everyone and is pleased to hear that I liked them so much. Those things were almost too delicious. They're deadly if you eat too many.

OptionResult.Result: The brownies WERE for everyone but everyone thinks I'm a pig for eating so many.
OptionResult.DiaryEntry: So, the brownies were for everyone and %FullName:NPC:1% made them. I loved them, they were so delicious. Obviously since I ate three. But %FullName:NPC:1% gets a little annoyed I ate so many since they were supposed to be for everyone. And everyone else is annoyed with me for pigging out. Whoops!
